text: The 2016–17 Russian Premier League (Russian: Чемпионат России по футболу 2016/2017, Chempionat Rossii po futbolu 2016/2017) was the 15th Russian Premier League season, and the 25th top division football tournament. It was played from 30 July 2016 to 21 May 2017. Spartak Moscow won the tournament. == Table == Team Qualification or relegation 1 Spartak Moscow (C) 30 22 3 5 46 27 +19 69 UEFA Champions League group stage 2 CSKA Moscow 30 18 8 4 47 15 +32 62 UEFA Champions League third qualifying round 3 Zenit St Petersburg 30 18 7 5 50 19 +31 61 UEFA Europa League third qualifying round 4 Krasnodar 30 12 13 5 40 22 +18 49 UEFA Europa League third qualifying round 5 Terek Grozny 30 14 6 10 38 35 +3 48 6 Rostov 30 13 9 8 36 18 +18 48 7 Ufa 30 12 7 11 22 25 −3 43 8 Lokomotiv Moscow 30 10 12 8 39 27 +12 42 UEFA Europa League group stage 9 Rubin Kazan 30 10 8 12 30 34 −4 38 10 Amkar Perm 30 8 11 11 25 29 −4 35 11 Ural Yekaterinburg 30 8 6 16 24 44 −20 30 12 Anzhi Makhachkala 30 7 9 14 24 38 −14 30 13 Orenburg (R) 30 7 9 14 25 36 −11 30 Relegation play-offs 14 Arsenal Tula 30 7 7 16 18 40 −22 28 Relegation play-offs 15 Krylia Sovetov (R) 30 6 10 14 31 39 −8 28 Relegation to FNL 16 Tom Tomsk (R) 30 3 5 22 17 64 −47 14 Relegation to FNL == Statistics == === Top goalscorers === 18 goals * Fyodor Smolov (Krasnodar) 13 goals * Artem Dzyuba (Zenit St Petersburg) 12 goals * Quincy Promes (Spartak Moscow) 10 goals * Ari (Krasnodar and Lokomotiv Moscow) 9 goals * Jonathas (Rubin Kazan) * Bekim Balaj (Terek Grozny) 8 goals * Denis Glushakov (Spartak Moscow) * Sergei Kornilenko (Krylia Sovetov) * Giuliano (Zenit St Petersburg) == References == == Other websites == * *2016–17 Russian Premier League at Soccerway Category:2016 in association football Category:2017 in association football Category:Russian Premier League
title: 2016–17 Russian Premier League
